mapper.select: select rest_id, r.name as name, t.name as type_name, exit_num, tel, nvl(open_date, ' ')as open_date, nvl(close_date, ' ') as close_date from tb_rest r inner join tb_rest_type t on r.type_id= t.type_id order by rest_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_rest ( rest_id, name, type_id, exit_num, tel, open_date, close_date, addr ) values ( s_rest_id.nextval, #{name}, #{typeId}, #{exitNum}, #{tel}, #{openDate}, #{closeDate}, #{addr} )
mapper.update: update tb_rest set name = #{name}, type_id = #{typeId}, exit_num = #{exitNum}, tel = #{tel}, open_date = #{openDate}, close_date = #{closeDate} where rest_id = #{restId}
